channel.title: Arduino IDE :: ESP3D Ecosystem
channel.description: Prepare the development environment Please download ide from https://www.arduino.cc/en/software Warning Please use the Legacy IDE (1.8.X) or the latest Arduino IDE 2.X Install the esp core according your target: ESP8266 Warning Please use the version 3.1.1. ESP32 Warning Please use the version 2.0.8. Copy the content of the libraries directory and extra libraries directory (according your target ESP8266 or ESP32 ) to your arduino library directory Warning Do not try any version different than the ones provided, they may not work properly.
